# About Omega Chi Epsilon - Purdue Chapter

Omega Chi Epsilon (ΟΧΕ) is the National Honor Society for Chemical Engineering students. Founded at Purdue University in 1942, our chapter promotes excellence in chemical engineering through scholarship, leadership, service, and character.

## Our Purpose
- Promote high scholarship
- Encourage original investigation in chemical engineering
- Recognize character, integrity, and leadership
- Advocate and support community service
